means: grass ： 指一般的青草或牧草。
herb ： 指可供药用或生产食物调料用的草。
weed ： 指混在作物中的杂草或园中的野草。

sentence.Network_en: Scoop the blanket weed out and use it to line hanging baskets.
sentence.Network_cn: 把那些丝状水藻捞出来，垫在吊篮里。

sentence.Network_en: Two and a half years ago I gave up the evil weed.
sentence.Network_cn: 两年半以前我改邪归正，不抽大麻了。

sentence.Network_en: His pond has been choked by the fast-growing weed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的池塘里长满了恣意蔓生的杂草。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wēod (noun), wēodian (verb), of unknown origin; related to Dutch wieden (verb)

encyclopedia.content: weed词典解释英文释义：a wild plant growing where it is not wangted,especially among crops or garden plants.名词 n. 1. 杂草；野草[C]The garden is full of weeds. 园子里杂草丛生。 2. 英口瘦长孱弱的人；软弱无用的人[C]3. 口香烟，雪茄烟，烟草[the S][U]4. 废物He is such a weed. 他真是个废物。 及物动词 vt. 1. 除掉锛堅硬蒿級;除去。..的杂草First thing tomorrow I'll weed the garden. 我明天一大早首先去除园内

entry.def: A weed is a wild plant that grows in gardens or fields of crops and prevents the plants that you want from growing properly.
Weed is a plant that grows in water and usually forms a thick floating mass. There are many different kinds of weed.

example.ex: Large, clogging banks of weed are the only problem.
example.tran: 唯一的问题就是大量水草阻塞了水道。

entry.def: If you weed an area, you remove the weeds from it.

example.tran: 卡斯珀正在给花园除杂草。

example.ex: Try not to walk on the flower beds when weeding or hoeing.
example.tran: 拔草和锄地时尽量不要踩到花坛。

entry.def: People sometimes refer to tobacco or marijuana as weed .

example.ex: Two and a half years ago I gave up the evil weed.
example.tran: 两年半以前我改邪归正，不抽大麻了。

means.word_mean: 1. any plant that crowds out cultivated plants

Sentence.sentence: One mother said that before her daughter was involved in this project, she would not even pour a weed.
They also took terms in watering, weeding and maintaining the plot.

sentences.en: My garden is running to weeds.
sentences.cn: 我的院子里长满了杂草。

sentences.en: Tomorrow I have to weed the garden.

jushi.english: My garden is running to weeds.
jushi.chinese: 我的院子里长满了杂草。

jushi.english: The old man is weeding in the garden.
jushi.chinese: 这个老人在园子里除草。

jushi.english: Peasants are busy weeding under the scorching sun.
jushi.chinese: 农民在炎炎烈日下忙着除草。
